body: See also *** https://nhentai.net/g/406762/ *** for how it all began, titled "Tomodachi no Hahaoya".

This series has all parts that appeared in COMIC Shingeki so I'll reference them with issue numbers. Sort of like 'prequel' to this, check out 2021-12: *** https://nhentai.net/g/378595/100/ ***. These parts appeared in 2022-01: https://nhentai.net/g/382278/64/ ***, 2022-02: https://nhentai.net/g/386320/68/ ***, 2022-03: https://nhentai.net/g/390228/98/ ***, 2022-05: https://nhentai.net/g/397821/84/ ***. Next part that is not here, check out part 5 in 2022-07: https://nhentai.net/g/405321/46/ ***. Finally, final part in 2022-08: https://nhentai.net/g/409136/106/
熟女讚，作者會玩，希望還能繼續出續集
